this game is now workable with certain conditions. Follow these instructions TO THE LETTER. IF YOU NEED HELP CONTACT ME!!!!!!! ALSO THIS ONLY WORKS ON THE US VERSION AND 60 GIG PHAT MODELS FOR EURO.

1) Download awsome file manager(heres a link:http://www.ps3-hacks.com/2010/09/17/awesome-filemanager-v0-01-released/)

4) open the file manager and press the (right) button on the -pad

5)once there go the the usb_dev000 or whatever usb device you placed the eboot.bin file

6)press the (left) button on the d-pad and go to the granturismo file

7) enter the usdir

8) press (select) and the screen will turn red.

9)find the eboot.bin file and delete it. (a do you want to delete this file message will appear. Accept it.)

10) press the (right) on th d-pad.

11)copy the other eboot.bin file on the usb and copy it to the file that your now in.(another do yo want to accept will appear.)

12)restart ps3 in jailbreak mode. And walah you game starts. Your all welcome. :)
